main_title: When NYC First Lit Up the Night Sky
hook: [excited] Get this—on September 4, 1882, New York City flipped the switch on its first commercial power plant! Thomas Edison’s Pearl Street Station lit up the streets, transforming the dark with electric lights.
description: In 1882, NYC lit up for the first time, transforming life forever! Discover Edison's groundbreaking achievement! #ElectricAge #ThomasEdison #NYCHistory
